channel.title: Questions about deltascape

item.title: Questions about deltascape
item.dc:creator: @Imnotokkk Imnotokkk
item.description:
@Imnotokkk wrote:

[quote=“Swift`, post:19, topic:255660”]But if you want to I believe it has something to do with this method in server.java:

[code] public void banHost(String host, int num) {
if (false) {
banned.add(host);
} else {
try {
misc.println(“BANNING HOST " + host + " (flooding)”);
banned.add(host);
delay = 2000;
delayUpdate = System.currentTimeMillis() + 60000;
} catch (Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}

}[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2009, 06:55:20 pm[/size][hr]Decrease the 'starter' amount then  :rolleyes:.[/quote]

Eh cant find out what to do with that[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2009, 07:47:06 pm[/size][hr]Dont wanna decrease

Read full topic

item.title: Questions about deltascape
item.dc:creator: @Swift1 Swift`
item.description:
@Swift1 wrote:

But if you want to I believe it has something to do with this method in server.java:

[code] public void banHost(String host, int num) {
if (false) {
banned.add(host);
} else {
try {
misc.println(“BANNING HOST " + host + " (flooding)”);
banned.add(host);
delay = 2000;
delayUpdate = System.currentTimeMillis() + 60000;
} catch (Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}

}[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2009, 06:55:20 pm[/size][hr]Decrease the 'starter' amount then  :rolleyes:.

Read full topic

item.title: Questions about deltascape
item.dc:creator: @Swift1 Swift`
item.description:
@Swift1 wrote:

Ok, I found the orbs. Open clickingmost.java and search for:

    c.sendQuest("Rock crabs", 15240);

You should see this:

c.sendQuest("Rock crabs", 15240); c.sendQuest("Dagg lair", 15241); c.sendQuest("Island", 15239); c.sendQuest("Cave", 15243); c.sendQuest("Slayer tower", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 1; break; case 51013: // training teleport c.sendQuest("Rock crabs", 15240); c.sendQuest("Dagg lair", 15241); c.sendQuest("Island", 15239); c.sendQuest("Cave", 15243); c.sendQuest("Slayer tower", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 1; break;
Change them to your teleport names, I’ll try to find out how to change the description now.

Read full topic

&& isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) {

is that only in figh pits or dieing in general[/quote]

toX = 2999+misc.random(3); toY = 3377+misc.random(3);
If you respawn in falador park still.

item.title: Questions about deltascape
item.dc:creator: @Imnotokkk Imnotokkk
item.description:
@Imnotokkk wrote:

Ive changed where they go but i want cave to say mith drag, rock crabs to say green drags and island to say KBD[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2009, 06:20:26 pm[/size][hr]In texthandeler.java i see this

c.sendQuest("Monster tele", 1415); c.sendQuest("Battle different monsters", 1416); c.sendQuest("Monster tele", 13071); c.sendQuest("Battle different monsters", 13072); c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13076); c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13077); c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13078)]
And i think that

c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13076); c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13077); c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13078)]
Has somthign to do with what the veiwing orbs say after you click on monster teles[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2009, 06:21:43 pm[/size][hr]AND in that code you gave me for death the part that says

&& isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) {

is that only in figh pits or dieing in general[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2009, 06:24:24 pm[/size][hr]Cause mine says this.

if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) { toX = 2399; toY = 5171; and i teled there and its in pits.

item.title: Questions about deltascape
item.dc:creator: @Imnotokkk Imnotokkk
item.description:
@Imnotokkk wrote:

  1. When you die how do you change where you go when you re-spawn? I have when you log in changed but not when you die.
  2. when you click on monster/minigame tele it gives like viewing orb interface or w/e i changed where they go but how do you change what they say?
    I went into autospawn.java and i see this…

c.sendQuest("Monster tele", 1415); c.sendQuest("Battle different monsters", 1416); c.sendQuest("Monster tele", 13071); c.sendQuest("Battle different monsters", 13072); c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13076); c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13077); c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13078)]
I assume the

c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13076); c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13077); c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13078)]
has somthing to do with the viewing orbs.
and finally
3.My this is set to 5 people aloud on from 1 ip how do i change that to 1 per ip?

Read full topic
